website_summaries.verdict: A great source of omega-3s with no worries about a fishy taste.
pros: Each serving contains 1,100 milligrams of omega-3, including DHA and EPA
Features a light lemon flavor that completely masks any fish taste

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: If you have GERD and asthma this product can cause both to flare up.
customer_reviews.text: Mine kept getting worse every day. I knew this product was the only thing new in my diet so I stopped taking it. My symptoms started going away. A week later I tried it again to confirm and sure enough everything flared up again. Since there was no warning on the label of any type I did request a refund, but the refund was not granted. I wrote this review to save someone some money.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Woman

customer_reviews.title: I did not do my due diligence in paying close ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not do my due diligence in paying close attention to the ingredients and the added vitamins. I will be switching to a completely natural fish oil product once I’m done with this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lighthouse

customer_reviews.title: A nice overall product
customer_reviews.text: A nice overall product, but it turns out it has vitamin D from lanolin added to it, yet this is not in the ingredients. Instead it is hidden in the nutrition box next to where it lists vitamin D. I have alpha gal syndrome and frequently have allergic reactions to vitamin D3 derived from lanolin including inflammatory arthritis. My first bottle was reaction free, my second bottle was not, and of course I got the bigger one that time :( I'd like to see better labeling by the company in the future and maybe some day they will offer one that uses vegan D3 for people with the dreaded red meat allergy.
customer_reviews.author: Darcie C.

customer_reviews.title: Pics showed this as having 40mg of ALA
customer_reviews.text: Pic shows outdated label or something. Shows 40mg of ALA, which is why I bought it. My label does not show it.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Quality fish oil not supposed to freeze
customer_reviews.text: "Pure fish oil wont freeze", Dr James Dinicolantonio in the book Superfuel. I put my brand new bottle in the freezer to and in the morning it was frozen solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More synthetic than natural
customer_reviews.text: Retuned it due to the process and synthetic vitamine A & D added
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Ressler

customer_reviews.title: back to it and I've been feeling good since. I've also noticed that my hair is ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a natural remedy for achy joints. I am 41 and began feeling slight aches on an almost daily basis, mostly in my hips, knees, and shoulders. I was skeptical of the benefits as touted by many from only a teaspoon a day, but figured it was worth a try. I was taking it for a couple of weeks and didn't think too much of it until I skipped a couple of days. The aches returned by the third day. Well, back to it and I've been feeling good since. I've also noticed that my hair is less dry. A little pricey but at such a small dosage, this bottle will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: Let’s not pretend our kids like the taste of this. Or us even. It tastes like fish oil but it seems to be doing what it’s supposed to do. I’ve only heard amazing things about the brand. My 6 year old brought me the bottle and a spoon and asked for some so she doesn’t get a colds anymore. That made me laugh. Fingers crossed it continues to improve my family’s health. It’s been a hard winter here!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Pierce

customer_reviews.title: The only fish oil I will buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Carlson's fish oil for many years, and am so glad it is available on Amazon. I have even bought the unflavored ones in the past, but the lemon in it takes all the fishy taste away. I eat a lot of fish in a week, well, at least 4-5 sandwiches worth, usually salmon and tuna, but also sardines and mackerel. I used to have high cholesterol, and low HDL, but now my HDL is near 60. I like to think that this diet change to fish and fish oil (one teaspoon every morning) had a huge play in that. I trust this brand and have never bought any other.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B.

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased this twice for my mother who is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this twice for my mother who is 86 years old and suffers from Rheumatoid Arthritis. Once she added a daily dose of this cod liver oil to her diet, she saw significant improvement in her RA symptoms. She swears by this particular cod liver oil, which we find hard to locate. Thank you Amazon for giving us access to hard to find products!
customer_reviews.author: HCT

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant taste
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any miracle stories to share, but I do believe this oil has given my health a boost. My whole family came down with the stomach flu recently and out of all of us, I was the only one to recover within 24 hours. I think a lot of it had to do with taking this oil daily. I've been taking it for about a month and I feel good overall. The taste was also surprisingly pleasant. I was expecting a potent fishy taste, but the subtle lemon flavor really helps neutralize any fish taste. It's actually very easy to drink the 1 tsp everyday. Definitely recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: 70 years ago when I was a kid..
customer_reviews.text: When I was a child (70+ years ago) my mother insisted we drink a spoonful of Cod Liver Oil every morning... (YUCK!) The taste was so gross I wanted to throw it back up. When I read reviews that this Cod Liver Oil didn't taste "fishy" I had a hard time believing it, but decided to give it a try. THIS PRODUCT DOES NOT HAVE A "FISHY" FLAVOR AT ALL!! YIPPEE! NOW I JUST HOPE IT HELPS KEEP ME HEALTHY...BUT I CONCUR WITH ALL OTHER'S...NO BAD "FISHY" FLAVOR AT ALL!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne A

customer_reviews.title: Good product!  Get the lemon flavor!!
customer_reviews.text: I mix a tablespoon of this with a tablespoon of apple cider vinegar (ACV) and 1/3 squeezed lemon in a bottle of water each morning. Took a while but got used to the taste ok. There is something to it as I've lost almost 50 lbs since doing this and following a semi-KETO eating routine along with Intermittent Fasting. Carlson's product is good - just make sure you get the LEMON flavor. and use it wisely as it's expensive stuff...those damn Cod must be hard to catch/sqeeze! : ) Be SAFE everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Friyet

customer_reviews.title: It will make you sick, don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this product because it caused me to see a Doctor to treat my upset stomach and heartburn, I wouldn’t recommend anyone to buy it. It is disgusting and will make you sick, don’t waste your money. My Doctor prescribed me a mediceine and recommended me to put in trush thrown this code liver oil product and never use it again. Two thumps Down. Even don’t deserve one star
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great for you scalp too!
customer_reviews.text: All my life I’ve had to use dandruff shampoo and still fought the flake war. Switching to a low carb diet about a year ago reduced my symptoms some but when I added this cod liver oil they went away almost completely. I’ve been able to use just regular shampoo for a few months now, this is a big deal in my world! Taste isn’t bad. I think the price is very fair based on the benefits. This is the only vitamin/supplement I take daily because it actually helps!
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Best Omega 3 supplement I've found
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different omega 3 supplements over the years and without fail, nearly all of them give me a "fishy burp" aftertaste. Not so with Carlson Cod Liver Oil. For starters, I don't have to take 3 to 5 giant capsules to get 3000 mg of Omega 3, only 1 Tbsp. Secondly, this cod liver oil has a refreshing and not at all overpowering lemon flavor. Lastly, the product arrived as expected encased in a "honeycomb" of protective bubble wrap. I definitely will be keep buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Improved my eyesight.
customer_reviews.text: My eyes have continued to improve. I use it about 3 times a week and I can now read without reading glasses. It is not perfect but much improved.
customer_reviews.author: DaMan

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Have been using it for years. No aches and pains. I also give about 1/2 tsp to my dog every day, and he's very healthy. My nutritionist recommended that we give it to everyone in the family, so I do. It's a terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: Fly By Night

customer_reviews.title: The best Omega 3 supplement I've found!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best omega 3 supplement I've found. So I keep re-ordering it on amazon. I prefer liquid form of omega 3 for maximum absorption. I like that it has high amounts of DHA and EPA unlike some other brands' ones which are lower. PAY ATTENTION that it's not just about overall omega 3 amount, but actual DHA and EPA mg count because that's what you need. I love that it DOESN'T taste fishy at all, all you taste is light lemon flavor. And I really like the ingredient list as well, pretty clean without some weird ingredients added.
customer_reviews.author: Natia

customer_reviews.title: Great source of vitamin and minerals
customer_reviews.text: Why do i love cod liver oil? It has great source of vitamin A and D. It’s known for inflammation reduction , to help with anxiety and stress. I’m a firm believer of all of this. Going throug a fertility acupuncturist and she recommended the cod liver oil - I’ve been hooked on it ever since. The taste is extremely tolerable - definitely take after a meal, full stomach!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Great Packaging -  Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Dreaded my daily spoonful of cod liver oil as a child. I was pleasantly surprised at how well this cod liver oil tastes! Loved the quick Delivery and excellent packaging with thick cover to keep oil protected and cool. Happy it comes in a glass jar. Looking forward to My improved health.....excellent company,
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I feel my mood is better (postpartum). Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Update: 15 months later and we still love it. I give it to my 18 months old and my new 3 month old baby. Also I take it myself. This last order came with a different bottle. It doesn’t say Cod Liver Oil but I think it’s the same product. I give this to my 3-month old baby and she likes it. Me and my husband also drink it. I feel my mood is better (postpartum). Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Valentim-Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Tastes nice, Large glass bottle comes in its own impact heavy duty impact bag
customer_reviews.text: Next time, I'm going to try the non-lemon flavor to see how it tastes. Very mild taste with hint of lemon. Fast delivery. Glass Bottle is beautiful - LARGE! It comes individually wrapped in its own heavy duty impact bag. Best packaging that I've seen. Taking this for my heart in this COVID-19 environment - 2 Tablespoon every single day - I look forward to taking it - that's how much the taste is good. Definitely NOT fishy at all. I want to order the non-lemon kind to use over my salad :=)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Consumer

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great taste.
customer_reviews.text: Im trying CLO for the first time because I want to get more dha/epa in my diet. Carlson's seem to be a standard for quality so I purchased a bottle. As soon as I received it I had a teaspoon-full straight from the bottle, the oil was light and quite lemony, but no fishiness at all. I added it to a shake with some vanilla flavored protein and it tastes amazing like a lemon cookie. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. The lemon flavor comes off a bit artificial at first, but I'm used to it now. I used to buy another brand, and by the time I got to the bottom of the bottle the oil would be milky colored and viscous. This bottle is twice as big and has remained fresh to the bottom. I keep it in the fridge. FWIW, I use this to keep depression under control and it does seem to keep me on a pretty even keel.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Teeth Remedy
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my teeth were tender. Cold, sugar.. anything would cause me pain. I was miserable. I saw on a website that taking cod liver oil helped a lot of people with tooth sensitivity, so I figured I'd give it a go. After 3 days of taking this, a teaspoon a day, I'm not in pain anymore. I will definitely keep taking this.
customer_reviews.author: R. N. Kinnison

customer_reviews.title: Excessive Lemon
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but I made an exception for this. The lemon flavor is so strong I burp it for up to 6 hours. What's the point in covering up fish odor with something even stronger? I'll have to dump almost the whole bottle.
customer_reviews.author: S. Garren

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a good Cod Liver Oil
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good Cod Liver Oil, but I switched to the pill form (same brand). The taste is not bad, it's just easier for me to grab two pills. I haven't noticed or felt any different. I just know my mom made me take this as a kid & I was always healthy. You may a slight issue with lemon burp after taking this. The pills are no different.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Product. Have been using it for 20 ...
customer_reviews.text: Top Quality Product. Have been using it for 20 years at the recommendation of my nutritionist. No fishy taste at all! Always kept it on hand in the refrigerator, to ward off any sickness which came along or to minimize illness. Usually take some on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Pookie4456

customer_reviews.title: Fake lemon flavor
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this oil! It has a VERY strong and fake lemon flavor to it that I could not get past. Even if I put a teaspoon in my smoothie...the artificial lemon flavor still jumped out to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lelia

customer_reviews.title: Great for our Toddler!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quality liquid fish oil that I could get my 2.5 yr old to swallow. Since I myself have been taking Carlson capsules for several years now, I was happy to find this product. We gave it a try and it works! Although it is difficult to hide the 'oily' factor, the lemon flavor is enough to convince her it's a refreshing treat to go along with her morning gummy vitamin. I wish it was less expensive for those on a budget but it's nice to have a friendly option for toddlers who don't drink milk or other things fortified with DHA.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Like a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: This is magnificent! It helps my joints, and prevents colds. As a kid, mother would feed us a tablespoon of codliver oil, quickly followed by a slice of orange or lemon, to ease the fishy taste. Now, this product is perfect, since it includes a non repugnant taste. Good job!
customer_reviews.author: D. Bourbon

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product that I have been buying for years
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that I have been buying for years. Preferred by children and tastes great. No complaints when I give it to them from a teaspoon. Younger kids may take it mixed with yougurt. I tried it myself and the lemon taste is very pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: mittencat

customer_reviews.title: You get back what you put in.
customer_reviews.text: Just got our second bottle! I absolutely love this product. The taste truly is delightful. It's a mild sweet lemon which I actually look forward to taking it each day. I do take a tablespoon daily rather than a mere teaspoon which just seems minute. I haven't necessarily noticed anything since I began taking this but regardless of that I am confident that it is helping my body maintain itself. You get back what you put in.
customer_reviews.author: RushingSpirit

customer_reviews.title: We trust Carlson's products
customer_reviews.text: Cod Liver Oil product comments provided by Carlson regarding contents: Promotes cardiovascular, cognitive, and joint function 1,100 mg of omega-3s per teaspoonful + vitamins A and D3 Wild caught, sustainably sourced Norwegian Arctic cod IFOS and IGEN non-GMO certified Freshness, potency, and purity guaranteed
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Colds and flu
customer_reviews.text: I have used cod liver oil in the winter months most all of my life because that is what my mother gave me and my siblings and we were not bothered with colds and flu. It seemingly keeps us from colds and flu, and my children,also, so I’m not going to change what seems to be working!!! I’ve never thought about it being a pain reliever! It has never stopped pain for me. I wasn’t expecting it, but pain that I have has not been touched or stopped when I am taking cod liver oil.
customer_reviews.author: K. Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 3 years now. It doesn't taste too bad because of the lemon flavoring. I always eat something when taking it or I'll get indigestion despite normally having a strong stomach. I notice a significant improvement in my skin if I take this everyday
customer_reviews.author: Maglio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect zest flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic flavor! My doctor has been wanting me to get this for my skin. I struggled with the thought of cod liver oil. Not any more! After trying this product I was hooked. Within two days I noticed a difference in my skin health! Postpartum my body feel like a mess and this is something that is helping! A couple nights ago, I measured out two doses and added it to our lemon basil pasta for dinner! So good!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew&Holly Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Not the Cod Liver Oil I Grew Up With - That's a Good Thing
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this a few days ago, so I can only attest to the taste. FANTASTIC. There is NO fishy taste. NO bitterness. NO aftertaste. And it doesn't come back up on me. It's a smooth, light oil that has only a very pleasing lemon taste. Seriously, it tastes so good, I'm always tempted to take more than the recommended one teaspoon per day, but I don't. WOW. Not at all like the stuff I used to get as a kid in the 1960's.
customer_reviews.author: Donny B.

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Good product. Please keep up the good work Carlson
customer_reviews.text: Makes me feel better after taking and has really helped circulation and using the bathroom easier. This is literally the only supplement that has probably ever worked as described for me. Best fish/cod oil I’ve tried to. I’ve tried lots. Notice hair nail and skin benefits after just a week of continuous recommended use and also a healthy diet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I can see why it won taste awards
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to try cod liver oil for the health benefits and especially to help elevate my omega 3's to help with night sweats. This stuff tastes great and it elevated my vitamin D levels and my night sweats disappeared after 1 week!
customer_reviews.author: LesB

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super product and I can’t say enough good things about it. Great quality and so beneficial for both health and brain. I take it everyday and give it to my baby as well. (The only critical thing I can say about it is the price 😯 In Norway this product costs between $10-13 and I can hardly believe that importing this product to the US adds this much to the price.)
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M.

customer_reviews.title: Best source of vitamin D for kids
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. We give it to our toddler in place of vitamin D drops bc it is a natural bioavailable source of vitamin D rather than the over processed drops. My son loves it, we always laugh at how excited he is to drink cod liver oil. It really tastes great. Once you’ve had it a few months the taste gets a little fishier but you’re only supposed to keep it for 90 days after opening so it’s a good indication to get a new bottle.
customer_reviews.author: H. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fishy Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Nice lemon flavor - having said that I like mackerel and uni ... so consuming cod liver oil is no stretch for me. Wife still gags on it a bit but struggles on because of the well advertised health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: pickymickey

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Since I was little, I was given cod oil from time to time by my mom. It was disgusting, terrible taste and odor. Now, I give it to my own kids. But I was trying to find a better cod oil compared to the one I was given as kid, I'm thankful I found this one! The taste is very acceptable and the odor is citrusy. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: LTC2015

customer_reviews.title: Not as fishy.
customer_reviews.text: If you like to use cod liver oil, but find the taste disgusting, then this product is for you. The citrus flavor takes away the fish factor, and makes it easy to drink.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like lemons. Seriously never once have I tasted anything but lemon. No fish taste at all. Consistently taking this for a few months now. Helps w/ my diet and for some reason more so during the winter. Perhaps the vitamin d?
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: Best cod liver oil!!️
customer_reviews.text: I feel like my body is healing from the 1st teaspoon. My mood, inflammation, skin, energy have gotten increasingly better. This cod liver oil will be used everyday for the rest of my life. The taste is great, so much so my kids take it without complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used long
customer_reviews.text: i have only used for a short time, but I notice that it is helping my digestive system. My sister said that it helps her to sleep. I just ordered one for my Mom and Mother-in-law.
customer_reviews.author: ACE

customer_reviews.title: Nothing happened
customer_reviews.text: I know I was using it but nothing really happened no change in the body
customer_reviews.author: Dusan T.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: My family started out taking fermented (Green pastures) cod liver oil. However, it is expensive and once I became pregnant I couldn't handle the overly fishy taste and thick texture. Carlson's still has a good vitamin A:D ratio and isn't as synthetic as cheaper brands. The lemony taste makes it super easy to get down, even my 2 year old doesn't mind it. If you are on the fence about the expensive stuff but want to get started with the amazing benefits cod liver oil has, I'd recommend going with a decent brand like this!
customer_reviews.author: meganwin

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Gave me bad burbs and gas never ever buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BURNETT

customer_reviews.title: A very good quality cod liver oil. No bad taste at all. Prescribed by my ND.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Carlson cod liver oil for years. I always ordered the natural flavor but for unknown reason they sent lemon flavored .YUCK! I hope they don't make that mistake again. The natural flavor is almost tasteless so there is no need to add lemon to it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Hertel

customer_reviews.title: Great for you!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes surprisingly great. Super healthy for skin, heart, and brain health, etc. Only wish they didn’t add synthetic vitamin A to it.
customer_reviews.author: RJ20

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take in
customer_reviews.text: What I most like about this CLO is that it doesn't taste bad - after first using a non-flavored oil and suffering through fishy gulps, I was very happy to try this lemon-flavored one that doesn't taste like fish at all. But I do caution you in that the fish residue does remain on kitchen-ware and even persists in the dishwasher long after it should. I had the misfortune of spilling a daily dose that was mixed in juice on the counter and the counter still smells weeks later - and the rag I used to clean it up with needed to be thrown away. Be careful what you get it on!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Taste is good!
customer_reviews.text: THis is the only kind of CLO I can get down. It's pretty tasty. I can not take large pills so the liquid is preferable to pills for me.
customer_reviews.author: drewed

customer_reviews.title: Lemony.
customer_reviews.text: I love lemon, so if you are trying to get more fish oil in your diet but don't like the "fish," this is a good choice. Don't get me wrong, there is a hint of fishiness, but I use this all the time in my salad dressings, Greek food, rice, on soups, and anything that needs a savory lemony flavoring (I wouldn't fry with it though).
customer_reviews.author: stephen andrews

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this. No stinky fist smell and nice lemon flavor. You can tell the quality.
customer_reviews.author: seulater

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to be good for me and the taste is OK.
customer_reviews.text: I was in a lecture and the Doctor giving the presentation highly recommend this particular brand and flavor. He has recommended it for years . I thought I'd try it.
customer_reviews.author: VCL1111

customer_reviews.title: Take your daily dose of cod liver oil with ease
customer_reviews.text: This comes in a very strong dark green glass bottle to preserve the contents. The lemon flavor is not over powering but just right that I can easily take a tablespoon daily without difficulty. Thank you Carlson Labs for making such a popular high quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, seems to help my kids with tummy issues
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for cod liver oil! Taste is great - for instance - my toddler asks to take this and will drink it from a spoon. I got advice to put this on my son’s pacifier to help with tummy issues early in his life and I do think it made a small difference.
customer_reviews.author: wh12

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Cod Liver Oil for years to get rid of hot flashes (as recommended by my compounding pharmacist). Works like a charm. Carlson's lemon flavored is the only one that doesn't have a fishy, foul taste. I've tried other brands, and this is by far the best. Once, for a few days, I was having a lot of hot flashes after taking what I thought was Cod Liver oil, but in fact, it turned out to be just fish oil. After I started taking the CLO, hot flashes disappeared. Whatever is in it works for me. And the other health benefits of Omega 3s are making it worth continuing on this same path.
customer_reviews.author: J Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Simple Lemon!
customer_reviews.text: Very happily surprised! To say I was nervous is an understatement! But I am so please with the slight lemon flavor! And for those of you who think it's too much, take a sip of water with it(before you swallow) and it tastes like lemon water....so simple and so important for our bodies! I started with the small one just in case, but I finished the bottle in less than 2 weeks so I got the big one in the mail just recently!
customer_reviews.author: SushiLover

customer_reviews.title: ... internal medicine Dr reccomend this brand and it tastes good.
customer_reviews.text: My internal medicine Dr reccomend this brand and it tastes good .
customer_reviews.author: Shawn smith moreira

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like lemon!!! Love it!! No fishy taste🥰
customer_reviews.text: I needed an omega 3 supplement and my mom had tried to convince me to try her brand which was really thick and tasted like fish and artificial berries. Really gross! I tried Norwegian Cod Liver Oil which was a bit more expensive but WORTH EVERY PENNY! Its not sweet just lemony and goes down really easy. I could not rate its effectiveness towards pain relief since I dont suffer from pain. But I will definitely will be taking it as preventative measure.
customer_reviews.author: Xochi

customer_reviews.title: Label does not match what is on the back. ...
customer_reviews.text: Label does not match what is on the back. Another user also has mentioned this. There are 2 added ingredients in this that is not shown when you buy the product!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Fish oil without the cat food regurgitation.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to boost my blood lipids into cardioprotective territory and reduce general inflammation. I've tried many capsules but ALL- even if refrigerated- will leave a fishy taste when burping. Yuck. This goes down easily, and even on the rare occasions I taste it the taste is mostly lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Doom

customer_reviews.title: the taste isn’t bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I’ve used many a fish oil product, to include krill oil. Ultimately, I keep coming back to Carlson’s because I can always trust that what I’m getting is the highest quality omega 3 on the market. Additionally, the taste isn’t bad at all. Great product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t taste awful!
customer_reviews.text: My husband said this was surprisingly tasty. It wasn’t delicious but he was expecting the typical taste that accompanies this oil and said he was surprised and it wasn’t unpleasant. That’s a win!
customer_reviews.author: beachwife

customer_reviews.title: This actually tastes GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: By all accounts, this is the best brand of Norwegian Cod Liver Oil around. Taste is surprisingly good. Any health benefit I provide is obviously anecdotal, but I do feel it has helped with knee pain.
customer_reviews.author: Edward F. Magowan

customer_reviews.title: The lemon flavor really is good, surprisingly...
customer_reviews.text: The lemon flavor completely eliminates any hint of fish taste when you take your daily dose. I REALLY like the no drip top on the bottle. I have tried other high quality brands and will likely stick with the Carlson product from now on.
customer_reviews.author: DVV

customer_reviews.title: Really tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to up my Omega 3 consumption. I was afraid of the awful cod liver oil I was force fed in childhood. To my surprise this has a really pleasant lemony flavor with no burping affect.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Lemony
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It tastes like lemon and there is no fishy aftertaste. It has really helped my joints as well as taking it for ulcerative colitis. I have not had any flares. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can not stand any type of fish to eat but I can take this just fine. I also like that it has a fair ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for the whole family. I give my children a spoonful every day and they are rarely sick. Has a decent taste too. I can not stand any type of fish to eat but I can take this just fine. I also like that it has a fair amount of vitamin A in it because it's good for you!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many Carlson Cod liver oil before of this same type but this one is unusable. Somehow they put way to much lemon flavor in this particular bottle / batch and it tastes terrible. I will have to dump it.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Chalmers

customer_reviews.title: decent flavor
customer_reviews.text: I used to take this before bed but for some reason I can't anymore. I get so nauseous and on the verge of puking! Makes me belch and the lemon flavor comes up on me.
customer_reviews.author: Christina S.

customer_reviews.title: Smell/Taste
customer_reviews.text: Tastes and smells amazing. You may think eww cod ..., liver... but seriously it smells totally like lemon. Even after having it for hours you can smell the lemon scent.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great taste.
customer_reviews.text: Item came very well packaged, which I was worried about, the taste is excellent just like a lemon drop, but with the consistency I still guzzle water behind to wash it down. All in all glad I found this cod oil and will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always avoided liquid fish oils since I don’t eat seafood and hat the taste, but this is undetectable. Just a slight lemon. Way more cost effective than capsules.
customer_reviews.author: angela g

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the heart
customer_reviews.text: The heart doc wanted my husband to take this. He also takes it. Hubby has taken it many years and I feel it has really helped his heart condition. It came quickly, was nicely packaged, and all went well with our purchase here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I take a tablespoon of this every morning. It's hands down the best flavored liquid fish oil you will find, I don't mind it at all. Yes it's pricey, but I believe worth it, and much more beneficial than capsules.
customer_reviews.author: bionicgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Lemon Flavor- No rancid fishiness.
customer_reviews.text: My doctor advised me to start talking a fish oil supplement (low good cholesterol) and after trying many different types and flavors this is by far the best. The other reviews say that this product has a nice lemon flavor afterwards and I can confirm. It is the best. While other types of fish oil cause me to burp up rancid fish flavors, I never had this problem with this oil.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Too Expnsive
customer_reviews.text: In the not so distant past I would get twice the amount of cod liver oil for the same price that I paid for this. I think that I may just go back to their regular fish oil which itself is quite expensive,
customer_reviews.author: John J. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Great for the elderly
customer_reviews.text: Easy way to get Omegas - if you don't like the flavor straight up, just add it to your favorite yogurt - makes it a little creamier with a light lemon flavor
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Howden

customer_reviews.title: Has a decent lemon taste!
customer_reviews.text: I took this to get more vitamin D from a natural source. I really didn't mind the taste. I'd buy this product again and I'd recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Goering

customer_reviews.title: Great for arthritis!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as an health supplement, but after taking it just once I noticed that the pain and stiffness from the arthritis in my neck disappeared! I’ll always take this cod liver oil!
customer_reviews.author: Marian Nicosia

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great in smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: Blown away that the taste is actually pretty delish. Not only that, but is absolutely delish in smoothies. Blueberry lemon is one of our NEW faves! And when I say "our" that includes all ages!!
customer_reviews.author: Love4thewin

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I like the lemon flavor and it seems to have helped my cholesterol problems, since I have started using this, for the past year or so. One spoonful a day.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L

customer_reviews.title: great for health
customer_reviews.text: Got it because I needed to take fish oil pills for general health. while it still tasted fishy I chugged it down and chased it with coffee so I didn't really taste the after taste. will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: The best Cod Liver oil on the market
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure anyone really loves the taste of cod liver oil. I always remember the nasty taste of the oil my grandmother forced us to take as a child. However, this oil actually has a fresh taste and I don't mind taking it at all every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not quite right
customer_reviews.text: The lemon ruins the otherwise great product, in my opinion. Others may enjoy it. My mother and I are switching to plain after this is gone. The brand and product, itself, is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Lycantis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my infants and I hear they love it. Best of all, no fish smells, the lemon makes it easy to take at night even after their nightly showers, no lingering smell.
customer_reviews.author: Samson

customer_reviews.title: Great! Toddler doesn't hate it.
customer_reviews.text: We call this "lemony oil." Started taking it to re-mineralize teeth when my 4 year old had some cavities starting to form. I'm hoping this at least helps to stop the formation(along with other dietary changes we've made based on Weston A. Price foundation principles). Taste is a pleasant lemon flavor. Doesn't taste at all "fishy." This seller had it wrapped VERY securely, too. It was a great deal here for $32(ish) for the 500ml bottle. I paid $28 for a 250ml bottle at my local health food store. Can't ignore a deal like this!
customer_reviews.author: Zoya Raysberg

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I tried everything and this works really well for my knee pain. Went off it for a few months and the pain came back. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Healed Me
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from Hydradenitis Supperitiva which can debilitating with pain, loss of energy and large infected wounds. After taking for 3 days! The wound I had closed and I have not had a flare up since! I feel really good. I can literally never stop taking this!
customer_reviews.author: K Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Friend likes it
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my friend who just recovered from colon cancer. I forced him to have some real cod liver oil (unflavored) at my house but then shipped this one to him as he was not too found of the fishy smell of the oil he tried at my house. He told me he doesn't mind it and uses daily. That's all I wanted to hear.
customer_reviews.author: Snegurochka

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great! Like lemon oil! No fishy odor at all!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality! It tastes like lemon. No fishy odor AT ALL! Easy to eat. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Roma Kaur

customer_reviews.title: this is your best bang for your buck when it comes to cod ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cod liver oil for about three years. It has no fishy taste, is very high quality, and has a high amount of omega 3s and vitamins. Really, this is your best bang for your buck when it comes to cod liver oil.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Champagne

customer_reviews.title: I’m sticking with it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using for years this to keep up with my omegas. Haven’t found a better source, Im healthy, so I’m sticking with it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to start taking a cod liver oil for health and so far I’m loving this one. I think the main issue that people worry about when taking would be taste and this has no bad taste at all. The lemon really does a great job. I have given this to my kids (8 and7) with no problems. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

product_meta.title: Carlson - Cod Liver Oil, 1100 mg Omega-3s, Liquid Fish Oil Supplement, Wild-Caught Norwegian Arctic Cod-Liver Oil, Sustainably Sourced Nordic Fish Oil Liquid, Lemon, 500 ml
feature_bullets: HEART, BRAIN, AND JOINT HEALTH - A single teaspoonful of Carlson Cod Liver Oil provides 1,100 mg of omega-3s, including EPA and DHA, which support heart, brain, vision, and joint health. To ensure maximum freshness, Cod Liver Oil is closely managed from sea to store.
AWARD-WINNING TASTE AND QUALITY - Carlson Cod Liver Oil has received numerous awards for its taste and quality. Carlson Cod Liver Oil is available in lemon, fruit splash, or natural flavor.

SUSTAINABLY SOURCED - We source the highest quality Arctic cod off the coast of Norway using traditional, sustainable methods. The same day they're caught, our Nordic cod are transported to a highly regulated Norwegian facility for processing and purification.

IFOS AND IGEN NON-GMO CERTIFIED - To protect the effectiveness of the nutrients found in our products, Carlson employs manufacturing techniques that avoid the use of excessive heat, moisture, and solvents to protect nutrient content.

FRESHNESS, POTENCY, AND PURITY GUARANTEED - Carlson Cod Liver Oil is bottled with a touch of antioxidants and is given a nitrogen flush to remove oxygen and to help prevent oxidation. Like all Carlson omega-3s, freshness, potency, and purity are guaranteed.
